doc.field: Records of New Perspectives on Caribbean Studies: Toward the 21st Century and Prospects for Caribbean Basin Integration(Conference held at Hunter College, CUNY, August 28-September 1, 1984)
Records of New Perspectives on Caribbean Studies: Toward the 21st Century and Prospects for Caribbean Basin Integration(Conference held at Hunter College, CUNY, August 28-September 1, 1984)
Series XII. Yale University Press Manuscripts (unpublished) June 1984 - May 1987
Series XII. Yale University Press Manuscripts (unpublished) June 1984 - May 1987

1.5 linear feet (3 boxes). Arranged as chapters of the proposed publication (see Box 20, Folder 1). This series consists of a select number of conference manuscripts that were revised and reorganized for a planned submission to Yale University Press. Although the planned publication did not materialize, the papers in this series include chapter title pages, indicated in italics, lists of submissions and revised manuscripts.
